participant_1.name: Emily Clark
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, she enjoys engaging with others and is always eager to share her thoughts.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up in a small town and moved to the city for college. She works in marketing and loves to explore new places.

participant_2.name: James Smith
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, he prefers deep conversations and values understanding and connection.
participant_2.background: James has a background in literature and enjoys writing in his spare time. He is passionate about social issues and often volunteers for local charities.
